title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond 'Addigai' Style Necklace
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut Diamonds and vibrant Emeralds. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen. Total weight: 117.960 grams. Diamond weight: 10.30 carats. Ruby: 4.31 carats (2 stones)
features: This stunning Addigai-inspired necklace showcases intricate filigree work with a floral motif, characteristic of South Indian craftsmanship. The centerpiece features a large, emerald-cut Emerald surrounded by dazzling diamonds. Smaller, pear-shaped Emeralds dangle gracefully, adding movement and sparkle. Each diamond is meticulously set in a pave setting, maximizing brilliance.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vivid green of the Emeralds and the dazzling white of the Diamonds creating a rich and luxurious color palette.
occasions: Perfect for a grand Indian wedding (Vivaham)
or other special occasions like Seemantham
description: A true heirloom piece, this Addigai necklace embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The exquisite craftsmanship, high-quality gemstones, and timeless design make it a valuable investment. The combination of diamonds and emeralds symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it an auspicious choice for brides.
